com.djrapitops.nmplayer.functionality

Class PlaylistManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.djrapitops.nmplayer.functionality.PlaylistManager

  • public class PlaylistManager
extends Object
    This class is used to manipulate the List containing Track objects called playlist.
    Author:
    Rsl1122
    See Also:
    Track

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PlaylistManager()
      Creates a new PlaylistManager with a new empty list as the playlist.
      PlaylistManager(List<Track> playlist)
      Creates a new PlaylistManager with given List as the playlist.

      • PlaylistManager

        public PlaylistManager(List<Track> playlist)
        Creates a new PlaylistManager with given List as the playlist.
        Parameters:
        playlist - A pre-existing List of tracks

      • PlaylistManager

        public PlaylistManager()
        Creates a new PlaylistManager with a new empty list as the playlist.

    • Method Detail

      • addTrackToPlaylist

        public void addTrackToPlaylist(Track t)
        Adds a new Track to the playlist.
        Parameters:
        t - Track to be added.

      • removeTrackFromPlaylist

        public void removeTrackFromPlaylist(Track t)
        Removed the given track object from the playlist.
        Parameters:
        t - Track to be removed.

      • clearPlaylist

        public void clearPlaylist()
        Removes all Tracks from the playlist.

      • getPlaylist

        public List<Track> getPlaylist()
        Grab the list containing all the Track objects called playlist.
        Returns:
        the playlist.

      • setPlaylist

        public void setPlaylist(List<Track> playlist)
        Replaces the current playlist with the given parameter.
        Parameters:
        playlist - a List used to replace the old playlist.

      • getTrackByName

        public Track getTrackByName(String trackName)
        Attempts to get a Track object from the playlist with the same track name as the parameter. If playlist contains multiple of the same name, the first one will be returned. If playlist contains none null will be returned.
        Parameters:
        trackName - Name to search for in the Track objects.
        Returns:
        Track object that has the same name, or null.

      • selectTrack

        public Track selectTrack(int i)
        Used get a Track object from the playlist for the selectTrack(Track) method. If random is enabled, the RandomOrderUtility index will be used to select the track.
        Parameters:
        i - Index of the track in the playlist.
        Returns:
        appropriate track object that is on the list.

      • isEmpty

        public boolean isEmpty()
        Check whether or not the playlist is empty.
        Returns:
        Emptiness state of the playlist.

      • getIndexOf

        public int getIndexOf(Track track)
        Used to get the index in the list of a certain Track object. If shuffle is enabled (isRandom()), the index of the track on the random order will be returned.
        Parameters:
        track - Track object to look for.
        Returns:
        Index of the given track object, -1 if not found.

      • hasTrack

        public boolean hasTrack(Track track)
        Used to check if playlist has the same track that was given as parameter.
        Parameters:
        track - Track to look for.
        Returns:
        Does the playlist have the track?

      • getCurrentTrack

        public Track getCurrentTrack()
        Used to get the currently playing track.
        Returns:
        currently playing track or null if nothing is playing.

      • setCurrentTrack

        public void setCurrentTrack(Track currentTrack)
        Change the current track variable and it's index varable.
        Parameters:
        currentTrack - new Track.

      • getCurrentTrackIndex

        public int getCurrentTrackIndex()
        Used to get the index of the current track.
        Returns:
        Index of the current track.

      • isRandom

        public boolean isRandom()
        Checks whether or shuffle is enabled.
        Returns:
        state.

      • setRandom

        public void setRandom(boolean value)
        Changes the shuffle status. a true will create a new RandomOrderUtility.
        Parameters:
        value - true/false
        See Also:
        RandomOrderUtility
